definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，数码图像隐写术仍然有一定缺点。

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他们一定有很强烈的渴望促使他们参加英语角。

sentences.english: Any liquid could be solidified under the certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 任何液体在一定条件下均可固化。

sentences.english: Suarez and Andy Carroll could be a real handful together next season.
sentences.chinese: 小苏和安迪下赛季的搭档一定会很牛逼的。

sentences.english: I must be in town next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我下星期六一定要进城去。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗一定有个行得通的方案，否则他不会这么干。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算铲完整条路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: Yet, some outcomes must be different between the two scenarios. Chen et al.
sentences.chinese: 但在这两种场景中，一定有一些结果是不同的。

sentences.english: It is research that is guaranteed to delight men - and infuriate the women in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究结果一定会让男人高兴，惹女人生气。

sentences.english: The antibodies have been altered to fluoresce under certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，这些抗体被变成能发出荧光。

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 请随时来我们商店转转，不一定非要买东西。

sentences.english: This study is significant for generation of ultra-short optical pulse chain at high repetition rate.
sentences.chinese: 该研究对高重复率脉冲串产生具有一定意义。

sentences.english: For anybody who bounces, their tremolo will be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果谁的右手上下跳动，那么他的轮指一定有问题。

sentences.english: Youll fail or go crazy for sure.
I send one to you eat, I believe you will like.
sentences.chinese: 我送一个给你吃口巴，相信你一定会喜欢的。

sentences.english: Who says breakfast has to be boring?
sentences.chinese: 谁说早餐一定是乏味无趣的呢？

definition: to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
